metadata.purpose: 18-phase development sequence for Flutter + PocketBase apps
metadata.usage: Manager AI follows this phase order when generating prompts. Skips phases not needed.

phases.name: PocketBase VPS Setup
phases.description: Coding agent SSHs into VPS directly and deploys PocketBase, assigns domain, configures Nginx reverse proxy and SSL

tasks.name: Deploy PocketBase to VPS
tasks.description: Coding agent SSHs into VPS, downloads binary, creates systemd service, sets up Nginx reverse proxy, SSL, and superuser â€” all executed directly by the agent
tasks.output: PocketBase running at https://domain.com with Admin UI accessible

phases.name: Foundation
phases.description: Create Flutter project, set up folder structure and basic configuration

tasks.name: Create Flutter Project
tasks.description: Initialize Flutter app with proper folder organization
tasks.output: Flutter project with lib/screens, lib/widgets, lib/services, lib/models, lib/config

tasks.name: Configure Dependencies
tasks.description: Add all required packages to pubspec.yaml
tasks.output: pubspec.yaml with pocketbase, provider/riverpod, go_router, etc.

tasks.name: PocketBase SDK Connection
tasks.description: Create PocketBase service with environment config
tasks.output: PocketBase client configured and connecting to server

tasks.name: Environment Configuration
tasks.description: Set up dev/staging/prod environment switching with dart-define
tasks.output: Environment config with different PocketBase URLs per environment

phases.verification: flutter run starts without errors, PocketBase health check passes

phases.name: PocketBase Collections
phases.description: Create all database collections, fields, and relations in PocketBase

tasks.name: PocketBase Migrations Setup
tasks.description: Create pb_migrations/ and pb_hooks/ folders, deploy.sh script for VPS sync
tasks.output: Backend folder structure ready, deploy.sh created

tasks.name: Create Collections
tasks.description: Define all collections with their fields via JS migration files in pb_migrations/
tasks.output: All collections created with correct field types

tasks.name: Define Relations
tasks.description: Set up relation fields between collections via JS migration files
tasks.output: All relations properly linked

tasks.name: Create Dart Model Classes
tasks.description: Create typed Dart model classes matching PocketBase collections
tasks.output: Model files in lib/models/ with fromJson/toJson

phases.verification: Collections visible in PocketBase Admin, model classes compile

phases.name: API Rules
phases.description: Set API access rules on all collections for security

tasks.name: Set API Rules
tasks.description: Configure listRule, viewRule, createRule, updateRule, deleteRule for each collection
tasks.output: All collections secured with proper API rules

phases.verification: Unauthenticated API calls are rejected, authenticated calls succeed

phases.name: Authentication
phases.description: Implement auth flows in Flutter (login, signup, password reset, OAuth)

tasks.name: Auth Service
tasks.description: Create auth service wrapping PocketBase auth methods
tasks.output: Auth service with login, signup, logout, session check

tasks.name: Login Screen
tasks.description: Create login screen with email/password
tasks.output: Login screen with form validation and error handling

tasks.name: Signup Screen
tasks.description: Create signup screen
tasks.output: Signup screen with form validation

tasks.name: Auth State Management
tasks.description: Create auth provider/notifier for state management
tasks.output: Auth state available throughout app

tasks.name: OAuth Provider
tasks.description: Add social login (Google/Apple) if required
tasks.output: OAuth login working

tasks.name: Forgot Password
tasks.description: Create forgot password screen with PocketBase requestPasswordReset
tasks.output: Forgot password screen sending reset email via PocketBase

tasks.name: Email Verification
tasks.description: Create email verification screen after signup with resend
tasks.output: Email verification flow with resend and auto-check

phases.verification: Can sign up, log out, log back in. Protected routes redirect to login.

phases.name: Layout & Navigation
phases.description: Set up app layout, navigation shell, and routing with GoRouter

tasks.name: GoRouter Setup
tasks.description: Configure GoRouter with all routes and auth redirect
tasks.output: All routes defined, auth guard working

tasks.name: App Shell / Scaffold
tasks.description: Create main scaffold with bottom nav or drawer
tasks.output: App shell with navigation working

tasks.name: Theme Configuration
tasks.description: Create app theme with colors, typography, component themes
tasks.output: Complete theme with light/dark mode support

tasks.name: Deep Linking
tasks.description: Configure deep links for email verification, password reset, and entity URLs
tasks.output: Deep linking working for all app URLs

phases.verification: All routes navigate correctly, auth protected routes redirect, theme applies globally

phases.name: State Management
phases.description: Set up state management layer and services

tasks.name: Service Layer
tasks.description: Create PocketBase service classes for each entity
tasks.output: Service files with CRUD methods per entity

tasks.name: State Providers
tasks.description: Create state management providers/notifiers
tasks.output: Providers wrapping services with loading/error states

phases.verification: Services fetch data correctly, providers expose state to UI

phases.name: Core Features (CRUD)
phases.description: Build CRUD screens for each entity
phases.estimated_prompts: varies (4 per entity: list, detail, create, edit)

tasks.name: List Screen
tasks.description: Create list/index screen for entity
tasks.output: Screen showing list of records with pull-to-refresh

tasks.name: Detail Screen
tasks.description: Create detail/view screen for single entity
tasks.output: Screen showing all fields of a single record

tasks.name: Create Form
tasks.description: Create form for adding new records
tasks.output: Form screen with validation and PocketBase submission

tasks.name: Edit/Delete
tasks.description: Edit form and delete functionality
tasks.output: Edit screen reusing form, delete with confirmation

tasks.name: Profile & Settings
tasks.description: Create profile, edit profile, change password, app settings, logout, delete account
tasks.output: Profile and settings screens with full account management

phases.note: Repeat tasks 07_01 to 07_04 for EACH entity. Task 07_05 (Profile) is done once.
phases.verification: Full CRUD cycle works for each entity in the app

phases.name: File Storage
phases.description: Implement file upload and display using PocketBase file handling

tasks.name: File Upload Widget
tasks.description: Create reusable file upload widget with preview and compression
tasks.output: Upload widget with image picker, compression, progress

tasks.name: File Display Widget
tasks.description: Create file display widgets (image, video, document)
tasks.output: Widgets for displaying uploaded files from PocketBase

phases.verification: Can upload files, files display correctly from PocketBase URLs

phases.name: Realtime (SSE)
phases.description: Implement realtime updates using PocketBase SSE subscriptions

tasks.name: Realtime Service
tasks.description: Create service for SSE subscriptions to collections
tasks.output: Service with subscribe/unsubscribe methods

tasks.name: Realtime UI Integration
tasks.description: Connect realtime updates to list screens
tasks.output: Lists auto-update when records change

phases.verification: Create/update/delete in PocketBase Admin â†’ app updates instantly without refresh

phases.name: Server Hooks (pb_hooks)
phases.description: Create PocketBase server-side JavaScript hooks for backend logic

tasks.name: Hook Setup
tasks.description: Create pb_hooks directory and basic hook structure
tasks.output: pb_hooks folder with hook JS files

tasks.name: Business Logic Hooks
tasks.description: Create hooks for triggers, computed fields, notifications
tasks.output: Working hooks that execute on record events

phases.verification: Hook triggers on record event, performs expected action

phases.name: UI Polish
phases.description: Refine UI with animations, transitions, empty states, loading states

tasks.name: Loading & Empty States
tasks.description: Create shimmer loaders, skeleton screens, empty state widgets
tasks.output: Professional loading and empty states throughout app

tasks.name: Animations & Transitions
tasks.description: Add page transitions, hero animations, micro-interactions
tasks.output: Smooth transitions throughout app

tasks.name: Dark Mode
tasks.description: Implement dark/light mode toggle with persistent preference
tasks.output: Dark mode toggleable, persists across sessions

tasks.name: Responsive Layout
tasks.description: Make layouts responsive for different screen sizes
tasks.output: App works on phones, tablets, landscape

tasks.name: Splash Screen & App Icon
tasks.description: Configure and generate app launcher icon and native splash screen
tasks.output: App icon in all sizes, native splash screen on both platforms

phases.verification: App looks polished on all screen sizes, animations smooth at 60fps

phases.name: Notifications
phases.description: Implement push notifications via Firebase Cloud Messaging

tasks.name: FCM Setup
tasks.description: Configure Firebase in Flutter project, permission handling
tasks.output: Firebase initialized, notification permissions requested

tasks.name: Notification Handler
tasks.description: Handle foreground, background, and tap notifications
tasks.output: Notifications handled in all app states

tasks.name: Server-side Trigger
tasks.description: PocketBase hook to send FCM on record events
tasks.output: Automatic push notification on new record creation

phases.verification: Notification received on both foreground and background, tap opens correct screen

phases.name: Payments
phases.prompt_style_note: Tasks 13_01, 13_02 = instructions_only (Flutter). Task 13_03 = exact_code (PocketBase webhook hook).

tasks.name: Stripe Setup
tasks.description: Configure Stripe in Flutter, create payment service
tasks.output: Stripe SDK initialized, payment service ready

tasks.name: Payment UI
tasks.description: Create checkout/payment screen
tasks.output: Payment form with card input, submit, loading states

tasks.name: Payment Webhook
tasks.description: PocketBase hook for Stripe webhook handling
tasks.output: Webhook processes payment events, updates records

phases.verification: Test payment with Stripe test card succeeds, record updated

phases.name: Offline & Cache
phases.description: Implement local database caching and offline support

tasks.name: Local Database Setup
tasks.description: Set up Hive/Isar for local caching
tasks.output: Local database initialized, adapters registered

tasks.name: Sync Logic
tasks.description: Implement cache-first fetching with background sync
tasks.output: App loads from cache first, syncs in background

phases.verification: App works in airplane mode with cached data, syncs when reconnected

phases.name: Error Handling
phases.description: Global error handling, user-friendly error messages, crash reporting

tasks.name: Error Boundary
tasks.description: Create global error handler, ErrorWidget override, SnackBar utility
tasks.output: Errors caught globally, shown as user-friendly messages

tasks.name: Error UI Widgets
tasks.description: Create reusable error display widgets and retry logic
tasks.output: Error widgets with retry buttons throughout app

tasks.name: Analytics & Crash Reporting
tasks.description: Set up analytics tracking and crash reporting for production monitoring
tasks.output: Analytics events tracked, crashes reported to dashboard

phases.verification: Force an error (disconnect internet) â†’ user sees friendly message with retry

phases.name: Testing
phases.description: Write widget tests and integration tests

tasks.name: Unit Tests
tasks.description: Test model classes and service methods
tasks.output: Unit tests for models and services

tasks.name: Widget Tests
tasks.description: Test key widgets render correctly
tasks.output: Widget tests for critical screens

tasks.name: Integration Tests
tasks.description: Test end-to-end flows (login, CRUD)
tasks.output: Integration test for main user flows

phases.name: Security Audit
phases.description: Review and harden all security measures

tasks.name: Security Review
tasks.description: Audit API rules, auth flows, data validation, sensitive data handling
tasks.output: Security checklist completed, all issues fixed

phases.verification: All API rules verified, no public write access, auth hardened

phases.name: Deployment
phases.prompt_style_note: Tasks 18_01, 18_02, 18_04 = instructions_only (Flutter builds). Tasks 18_03, 18_05 = exact_code (PocketBase production config + verification).

tasks.name: Android Build
tasks.description: Configure signing, build release APK/AAB
tasks.output: Signed APK/AAB ready for Play Store

tasks.name: iOS Build
tasks.description: Configure provisioning, build release IPA
tasks.output: Signed IPA ready for App Store

tasks.name: PocketBase Production Config
tasks.description: Harden PocketBase for production (backups, SMTP, rate limiting)
tasks.output: PocketBase production-ready

tasks.name: Force Update & Version Check
tasks.description: App version checking and force update mechanism via PocketBase config
tasks.output: Version check on app start, force/optional update dialogs

tasks.name: Backend Verification
tasks.description: SSH into VPS and verify all collections, hooks, rules, CRUD working
tasks.output: Backend fully verified on VPS â€” all collections, hooks, API rules secured

phases.verification: Release builds install and run correctly on real devices
